column1: Local Foods////I almost always get the Vegan Chili as my side.  The first time I had it
column2: I was a little skeptical (usually my inner carnivore and "vegan" don't get along too well)
column3: but I was sold with the first spoonful.  Even if you're a meat eater
column4: definitely give it a shot - it's full of flavor
column5: and really accompanies the sandwiches nicely!
